name: Moments (Persici)
description:
Very amateur execution of the idea of evolution in games, starting from the most basic elements and forever evolving. 

Sources

  • Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all
  • Art drawn with: https://www.pixilart.com

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/modular-first-person-control...
